games.title: Color Pixels - Coloring by Numbers
games.description: Immerse yourself in a delightful realm of art and tranquility with Color Pixels - Coloring by Numbers. Easily turn black-and-white images into colorful creations by following the numbered instructions. This free online game offers a fun way to unwind, whether on a phone or computer, allowing everyone to achieve beautiful results.
games.howToPlayText:
Your task is to transform black-and-white images into vibrant works of art by coloring them by numbers. You can play on both computers and touch devices like phones and tablets.

Controls:
1. Select a category from the gallery, then choose a picture to get started.
2. Zoom in or out: Use the slider at the top of the screen, pinch gestures, or your mouse wheel to focus on details.
3. Pick a color: Choose the desired color from the palette at the bottom of the screen.
4. Color by numbers: Find the corresponding areas and bring the picture to life with color.
5. Use boosters: Speed up the coloring process with special tools and achieve the best results.

games.title: Cube Drop Puzzle
games.description:
Join the ultimate puzzle challenge in Cube Drop Puzzle

Test your strategic thinking in this addictive game where you must drag and drop furniture-shaped blocks to match colors with their corresponding stick figures. Plan your moves carefully as you navigate limited space and increasingly complex levels. With its vibrant visuals and easy-to-learn mechanics, Cube Drop offers endless hours of brain-teasing fun!

Key Features:

Unique Puzzle Mechanics: Combine the best of block puzzles and color-matching games.
Challenging Levels: Navigate tricky layouts and test your problem-solving skills.
Intuitive Controls: Simply drag and drop to play!
Vibrant Visuals: Enjoy colorful graphics that bring each puzzle to life.
Progressive Difficulty: Start easy and work your way up to more challenging levels.
Ready to drop into the fun? Download Cube Drop Puzzle and start solving today!
games.howToPlayText:
🧩 How to Play
- Drag and move the holes across the board
- Match each cube to its correct color block hole
- Let the glasses drop smoothly into the hole
- Solve each puzzle step by step, using logic and strategy
- Complete the level when all coffee cups fall into the right place

games.title: Slinky Color Sort
games.description:
Experience the fun of color therapy with this unique puzzle. Try the newest Color Sort game, perfect for relaxation, and enjoy the Slinky Sort Puzzle. Explore multiple levels in a game designed to relax you.

Join Slinky Color Sort Puzzle, an addictive game that offers both challenge and relaxation with the task of sorting colorful rings. Join in and get your brain fired up with colorful excitement!
games.howToPlayText:
✓ Drag and drop to move slinky rings by simply tapping the same color
✓ Only the same color can be moved at a time
✓ You can only move a ring onto another ring if both rings are the same color
✓ Place slinky rings of the same color in a single stack
✓ Solve logic puzzles with your color matching skills

games.title: Smash & Merge Balls
games.description:
Short Description: A skill-based arcade game with colorful physics.

Full Description: In this game, you control a character that starts a fusion chain reaction! 
Strike the colorful balls to get them moving. 
The key rule: when two balls of the same color collide, they merge, and you earn points. 
Create massive chains of mergers to maximize your high score!


(lore)
(from the Showman):
Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls! Welcome to the greatest show in the cosmos — the Arena of Fusion!

Here is your instrument of chaos — the mighty merger mallet! Don't be shy, give it a swing! 
Your mission is brilliantly simple: step onto the arena floor and prepare for a rainbow deluge! 
Smash those colorful spheres, make them crash, and when two of the same color meet — 
BOOM! — they fuse into a glorious explosion of points!
games.howToPlayText:
-Use the "WASD" or the "touchscreen joystick" to move
-Use the "Space" or the "touch-screen button" to dash
-Use "left mouse button" or "Touch screen button" to Hit
-Hit the balls and collide the balls of the same color to score points, 
when they collide they create another ball of random color.

games.title: Sorting Ball Puzzle
games.description:
As the most relaxing and addictive color sorting game, this ball puzzle is designed to entertain and sharpen your mind at the same time. While sorting the colored balls to fill each bottle with the same color, the relaxation it brings will relieve stress and distract you from your daily worries.

This classic color sorting game is pretty simple to play, but hard to master. Just tap to take a colored ball from one bottle and stack it into another bottle, until all balls of the same color are in the same bottle. However, there are thousands of puzzles of varying difficulty. The more challenging the puzzles you play, the more careful you need to be with each move. Each move cannot be taken lightly, or you may get stuck! This Ball Sort game is definitely the best puzzle game for you to exercise your brain and train your logical thinking.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap any bottle to pick up the top ball, then tap another bottle to move the ball into it.
You can only stack the ball into a bottle with the same color ball on top and enough space.
When balls of the same color are sorted into a single bottle, you win!
Each bottle can only be placed with 4 balls.
Use "Undo" to go back to previous steps.
Add an extra bottle if you get stuck.
You can restart the current level at any time.

games.title: Slide Block Jam
games.description:
Slide Block Jam: The Ultimate Puzzle Adventure

Unleash your puzzle-solving skills in Slide Block Jam, the ultimate block puzzle game that will challenge your mind and keep you hooked for hours! In this captivating and strategically engaging game, your goal is simple: move colorful blocks to their matching colored doors to clear the way. However, each level introduces new obstacles and challenges, requiring you to think carefully and plan your moves to master every puzzle.

Endless Puzzles, Limitless Fun
Prepare yourself for puzzles designed to test both your logic and strategic thinking. As you progress, the levels become increasingly intricate and creative, keeping you engaged with new challenges at every turn. Whether you're sliding blocks to clear space or navigating through tough barriers, the thrill of solving each puzzle intensifies.
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play:
* Slide the blocks: Move the colorful blocks to their matching colored doors.
* Solve each puzzle: Plan your moves carefully to clear the path and complete the puzzle.
*Think strategically: Every level presents a new challenge, so use your wits to find the most efficient way to clear the blocks.
* Unlock new challenges: With each level you complete, new and more difficult obstacles open up, keeping the excitement going!

games.title: Bubble Blast
games.description: Bubble Blast is an entertaining casual bubble shooter where you pop bubbles and take on exciting quests. It''s the classic game you''ll catch yourself and others playing on the way to work. Advance through levels, collect coins, and sharpen your skills. Use boosters to achieve three stars and come back for daily rewards!
games.howToPlayText: Shoot at bubbles with the same color as the one loaded in your bubble blaster to pop them. You can switch the bubble with one of another color if the one currently loaded isn’t useful.

games.title: Stand on the Right Color, Robby!
games.description:
"Stand on the right color, Robby!" is an addictive arcade game where your goal is to reach the finish line by jumping on colored tiles. You need to react quickly when the color tiles change randomly. You have limited time at each stage. Be vigilant and react instantly so as not to fall and get ahead of your rivals.

Your reaction, accuracy and skill will be put to the test. In this exciting game you have to fight for first place on your way to the finish line.

Earn in - game currency and unlock unique Robls skins, items and effects - this will add excitement and variety to the gameplay.

Are you ready to take on the challenge and complete all the tiles to the finish line in this incredible game? Defeat your opponents, reach the top of the leaderboard and prove that you are the best!
games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to reach the finish line.

Computer control:
W, A, S, D, Right mouse button - character control
Space, Left mouse button - jump
Mouse - camera control

Mobile controls:
Left joystick - character control
Button on the screen - jump
Right joystick - camera control

games.title: Bus Color Jam
games.description:
Bus Color Jam – Fun Puzzle Adventure with Colorful Challenges!

Get ready for Bus Jam, the ultimate bus game that’s all about matching passengers to their buses in this relaxing yet brain-teasing bus mania adventure. It's up to you to solve fun, colorful puzzles and clear the way to send each passenger on their dream vacation!

In this exciting puzzle game, you'll encounter progressively challenging levels as you advance. Your goal? Strategically match passengers with their correctly colored buses!
games.howToPlayText:
Tap a passenger to send them toward the bus. If the passenger’s color matches the bus, they board immediately. If not, they wait in the empty tile(s) provided.
If you run out of empty tiles and a mismatched passenger arrives, you'll fail the level.
You must board all passengers correctly to finish the level. Successful completion rewards you with coins.

games.title: Square Sort
games.description:
The game involves swiping colorful cubes in any direction to clear the board. The objective is to sort the squares by color, and the game gets progressively harder with each level.
The user interface is simple and easy to use, with visually appealing graphics that are pleasing to the eye. The game has a relaxing soundtrack that complements its challenging gameplay. Square Sort offers a great way to exercise your brain while having fun, and it's perfect for those who enjoy puzzle games. The game is free to download and play, with no in-app purchases or ads to interrupt the gameplay.
games.howToPlayText:
Swipe to Move: Swipe the colorful cubes in any direction to move them across the board.
Match Colors: Align cubes of the same color in a row or column to clear them from the board.
Limited Moves: Each level has a set number of moves. Plan your swipes carefully to maximize efficiency.
Progressive Difficulty: As you advance through levels, the complexity increases with more colors and larger grids.

games.title: Sheep Sort
games.description:
Welcome to Sheep Sort Color Match Puzzle Game! 
This is the best Color Puzzle Game where you sort sheep, match colors, and have lots of fun! Sheep Sort Color Match Puzzle Game is easy, relaxing, and full of cute sheep. Enjoy sorting sheep in this amazing Color Puzzle Game!
games.howToPlayText:
- Your job is to sort sheep.
- Tap the sheep and match them by color.
- Sort and match sheep correctly to win each puzzle.
- Complete each puzzle level to move to the next exciting puzzle.
- Puzzles get harder, but sorting and matching sheep becomes more fun!
- Use boosts to sort sheep faster and solve tough puzzles.

games.description: Color your world with our interactive web coloring book game! Choose from a variety of fun drawings to bring your imagination to life.
games.howToPlayText: Select a drawing from our coloring book and use the virtual crayons to color it in. Experiment with different colors and techniques to create your masterpiece. Once you're done, save and share your creation with friends!

games.title: Fluffy Mania
games.description:
In this game, your objective is to form chains on fluffy animals on the screen. 
The longer you can maintain the chain, the more points you will earn. 
Putting a cute twist on the traditional matching genre, Fluffy Mania is the best game to relax and kill time with.
games.howToPlayText:
Click and drag to form chains on fluffy animals with the same color. 
The longer the chain, the more points you earn.

games.title: Chroma Trek
games.description: Immerse yourself in Chroma Trek, a breathtaking neon platformer that dazzles with vibrant visuals and innovative gameplay. Each level is a unique masterpiece, offering diverse challenges that keep you engaged and on your toes. The core mechanic of color-switching lets you seamlessly pass through various types of obstacles, adding depth and excitement to every moment. As you navigate through dynamic environments, you'll be uplifted by motivational messages from the creator, encouraging you to push forward and conquer the journey to the Finish Crystal!
games.howToPlayText:
Objective: Navigate through a series of challenging obstacles to reach the Finish Crystal and complete the level!

Controls: Move your character using one of two control schemes:
A or ←: Move Left
D or →: Move Right
W or Spacebar: Jump

Gameplay:
Dodge Obstacles: Avoid traps, pits, and other hazards.
Reach the Crystal: Find and touch the Finish Crystal to win the level.

games.title: 4 Color Card Game
games.description: 4 Color Card Game is a fast-paced, easy-to-learn card game perfect for players of all ages. The goal is simple: match cards by color or number and be the first to get rid of all your cards. With action cards that can change the flow of the game in an instant, every round is full of surprises and fun. Whether you're playing with friends, family, or challenging opponents online, 4 Color Card Game delivers quick, exciting matches that keep you coming back for more.
games.howToPlayText: To play 4 color card game on a desktop, use your mouse to interact with the cards. Your hand appears at the bottom of the screen. To play a card, move your cursor over a matching card and left-click it to place it on the discard pile. If no cards match, click the draw pile to get a new card. For Wild cards, click to play, then select a color by clicking the desired color option. When you have one card left, click the “TAP” button to avoid penalties. The game automatically ends your turn after each action.

🎮 Start with 2 fruits, pop more 💥 to unlock new ones 🔓 and boost your strength 🚀!

games.howToPlayText: 🎯 Get ready for endless fun with Pop Sweet Fruits! 🍓🍒 Start the game with 2 sweet fruits 🍑🍊, pop fruits 🍍🍉, unlock new ones, and boost your power! 🚀 Upgrade your bullet speed 🔫, fire rate 🔥, and earnings 💰 to collect them all! 🍇🍋 With 7 language options 🌍 (Turkish 🇹🇷, English 🇬🇧, German 🇩🇪, Italian 🇮🇹, Spanish 🇪🇸, French 🇫🇷, Russian 🇷🇺), enjoy the excitement worldwide! 🎮 Test your reflexes ⚡, level up 📈, catch the thrill 🎊, and join this addictive 🌀 juicy adventure! 🚀🍏

games.title: Dot and Dot
games.description:
Dot and Dot is a vibrant puzzle game where players connect matching dots without crossing paths. 
With 2000 challenging levels, features like hints, auto-complete, and right-click line removal enhance the experience, testing your logic and spatial skills.
games.howToPlayText: Use your mouse or touchscreen to drag and connect dots of the same color. There should be no empty spaces on the map.

games.title: Balls Animal
games.description: Balls Animal is an addictive brain teaser where players sort colorful balls into matching tubes to solve challenging puzzles. With over 500 increasingly difficult levels, this cute puzzle game will keep you entertained for hours as you strategize the perfect moves to complete each level. The game features adorable animal characters that add charm to your puzzle-solving adventure, making the experience even more delightful. Perfect for puzzle lovers of all ages, Balls Animal combines simple mechanics with strategic thinking, making it easy to learn but satisfyingly challenging to master.
games.howToPlayText: Click on the bottle from which you want to take the ball, then click on the one where you want to place it.

games.title: Block Sort Puzzle
games.description: Block Sort Puzzle is an exciting multi-colored block sorting puzzle that will test your logic and attentiveness! Sort as fast as possible to collect the highest tower, as well as to multiply your points! Nice animation of moving tiles.
games.howToPlayText:
How to play:
- Drag the blocks onto the desired tile.
- Put the same colors side by side to combine and score points.
- When combining blocks, the multiplier of the current points increases.

games.description: Experience the exciting challenge of "Screw Color Puzzle," an engaging online game that puts your skills to the test. Match screws with their corresponding colors in a captivating setting. Enjoy this free game on your computer or phone for hours of enjoyable, brain-stimulating entertainment.
games.howToPlayText:
Solve screw puzzle! Match color of the screws with screw case's color! Remove all 
the screws to progress through the levels. Challenge and test your IQ!

games.title: Art Master Puzzle
games.howToPlayText:
Begin with a black-and-white image: Each level starts as a blank, monochrome picture.
Piece selection: At the bottom of the screen, colored puzzle pieces are displayed.
Match and place: Tap and place each colored piece into its correct position on the image.
Reveal color: As you fit pieces, the black-and-white image gradually transforms into a bright, full-color composition.
Use hints if needed: The game offers free hints to assist you if you're stuck.
Enjoy the art: After completion, the animated, colorful picture comes alive for you to admire.

games.title: Home Design: Decorate House
games.description:
Welcome to renovation game, where all your dreams come true! Renovate and decorate your home and solve challenging puzzles with this relaxing match 3 design game!

If you ever dreamed of having a mansion of your own, now’s your chance in this redecor game! Move into your mansion with tons of rooms, gardens, swimming pools, playgrounds, and decorating this house! Everything you can imagine you’d find in a house decor we got it here!

Home Design: Decorate House is not just a home decoration and matching game:
• A combination of match 3 game puzzles plus home decorating gameplay brings you an overwhelming fun gaming experience!
• Design, decorate, unlock new rooms, plenty of house areas to renovate, never get bored!
• All mansion makeover needs is a brilliant mind of a talented designer like you!

Decorate the library, kitchen, garden, tennis court, swimming pool and many more house areas to come! Help her renovate dream house to make it the best manor in town in this puzzle game!
games.howToPlayText: Complete levels by playing match 3 and earn brushes. On these brushes you can repair and decorate your home.

games.title: HexaSort
games.description:
Отличная головоломка с сортировкой
Сортируй гексы по цветам
Выкладывай их так, чтобы плитки одного цвета оказались рядом. 
Тогда стопка исчезнет!
games.howToPlayText:
Выкладывай плитки на игровой стол.
Старайся расположить плитки одного цвета рядом, тогда столбики сольются и исчезнут!
Используй подсказки 🙂

games.title: Stack Swipe
games.description:
Welcome to Stack Swipe, a colorful puzzle game where every swipe brings you closer to satisfying chain reactions!
Swipe to shift entire rows or columns and stack same colored plates.
Match at least 5 plates in one stack to trigger a blast and work your way toward the level’s target!
games.howToPlayText:
Swipe in any direction to move all plates across the grid.
Plates only move and stack if there's a same colored plate in their swipe direction.
Stack 5 or more same colored plates to automatically blast them!
Tap the Serve button to spawn new plates into empty spaces and sometimes even on top of existing ones!

games.title: Tower Colour Crash
games.description:
Crash the Tower! Only the best crashers will be able to destroy all
towers in this 3D physics game. Try to let all towers collapse with
the amount of given balls. But you will only destroy the shapes
with the same colour as you ball. Use the powerful earthquake or
shotgun power ups, to create huge chain reactions, which will
lead into the towers destruction. Beautiful designed levels and
shapes will await you, so don’t waste any second and become
the greatest tower crasher of ‘em all!
games.howToPlayText:
- Start each level by choosing the right angle to hit the tower, swipe right or left.
- Throw the Ball on Blocks of the matching colour to destroy it!
- Make the Tower collapse!

games.title: SORTY BOLTY
games.description: SORTY BOLTY revolves around the theme of organization and color coordination. Players are tasked with sorting vibrant nuts onto corresponding bolts, creating a visually satisfying and mentally stimulating experience. The game's appeal lies in its straightforward mechanics that gradually increase in complexity, challenging players to think several moves ahead.
games.howToPlayText:
1 step: Click/Tap on a bolt to select a nut
2 step: Click/Tap on another bolt with the same color (or empty) to collect nuts
Use the hints if you get stuck:
Cancel move - undoes the last step you made
Extra bolt - opens extra space for nuts

games.title: Brain Coloring Puzzle
games.description:
Discover Italian Brainrot Meme Coloring Puzzle Game
Step into the viral world of Italian Brainrot Meme Characters, where over thirty absurd creatures await your palette. No numbers, no hints—only your eye for color and a playful spirit.
Meet the Stars
Bombardiro Crocodilo: Our most fiendish color‑match boss.
Tung Tung Tung Tung Sahur: A viral sensation inspired by Italian Brainrot.
Shimpanzinni Bananinni, Boneca Ambalabu, Tralalero Tralala and many more bring humor and challenge.
Why You’ll Love It
Brain‑Boosting Fun: Sharpens visual memory and logic.
Creative Freedom: No right answer—trust your instincts.
Offline Play: Dive in anytime, anywhere.
Designed for Ages 12+: Simple enough for kids, intriguing for teens and adults.
Ready to color outside the lines? Tap Install and unleash your inner artist on the most delightfully absurd paint‑puzzle around!
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play
Select Your Palette: Pick from 4–5 vibrant hues.
Tap to Color: Assign each color to outfit, shoes, hair and more—without numeric guidance.

games.title: Pinata Color Smash
games.description:
Smash Color Pinatas by Selecting the matching color bat. You can Select Bats on top and then the bottom bats are revealed.
You can Place Extra Bats on 5 Tile Slots and use them when needed.
Pinatas Color Smash is a colorful and engaging puzzle game where players aim to break Pinatas by selecting matching colored bats. The game offers a fun and casual experience suitable for all ages.
games.howToPlayText:
At the top of the screen, you'll see a selection of bats. 
Choose one that matches the color of the Pinata you wish to break.
After selecting a bat, the corresponding bat at the bottom of the screen will be revealed.
You have five tile slots where you can place extra bats. Use these when needed to help break more challenging Pinatas.

games.title: Wood Color Block
games.description:
Wood Color Block is a new free puzzle game that combines fun, relaxing and brain-teasing challenges! 
Step into a world of colorful wooden blocks, where your goal is to crush all color blocks by move them to their perfect color crushers – the more you smash, the more fun it gets! 
Every level brings a new set of challenges, with increasing difficulty and clever block arrangements that will keep you on your toes.
games.howToPlayText:
Slide the color blocks: Find the way to get the color blocks into the same color crushers to break them. Whether you're sliding, moving, or aligning the blocks, each action you take requires careful thought and planning.
Clear your path before time runs out: With exciting puzzles and unique block mechanics, you'll need to think strategically to break all the blocks and escape before time runs out.
Boosters: As you progress, you'll unlock new tools and power-ups to help you overcome even the toughest puzzles

games.title: Amaze!
games.description: Get ready to be amazed! In this game, pop and move the ball to paint your way through challenging maze puzzles. Color every square to unlock new levels, but be strategic—AMAZE gets tougher as you progress. Each level is a canvas, and you must fill every square completely to conquer the maze. Don’t miss a spot, or you’ll be stuck forever! Are you ready for an extraordinary paint puzzle adventure? Let’s pop the maze with color and crossy road challenges!
games.howToPlayText:
You will have to color the puzzle mazes.
To pass the puzzle, fill each square with a color.
The game gets harder as you play, color the maze and pass the puzzles!
Each level is a canvas, color it with marbles!
Coloring the maze seems simple, but you need to choose the right path and strategy to color the maze and fill each square.

If you don't fill at least one square with marbles, you will be stuck in the maze forever!

Game Objective:
Fill each square with a color to complete the level.

PC Controls:
You can use mouse, keyboard arrows or w,a,s,d buttons to control the ball.

Control on mobile device:
Control the ball with your finger.

games.title: Hidden Paint 3D
games.description: Coloring 3D is an exciting game where you can animate objects with the help of color. Just click on various objects and they will instantly turn into bright and beautiful shades. The game is suitable for all ages, offering a simple and relaxing way to show your creativity.
games.howToPlayText:
Task:
1. Find all specified items.
2. Color them by clicking.
3. Move to a new location with a new environment!

games.title: Ball Sort Puzzle - Color Game
games.description: Explore the exciting realm of Ball Sort Puzzle, a colorful sorting challenge designed for puzzle enthusiasts. Enjoy free gameplay on your phone or computer, featuring hints, undo options, and extra tubes to enhance the fun. Perfect for both beginners and experienced players alike.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap a tube to select the ball on top.
Tap another tube to move the ball there—just make sure the ball matches the color on top and there's space in the tube!
And that's all! Simple, right? Now, the only question is: how many levels can you beat?

games.title: Color Fall
games.description: Color Fall is a captivating puzzle game where you match colors with precision by sliding pins in various directions. As the difficulty increases, strategize to navigate levels while avoiding the black color. Playable on Android and desktops, it’s a free game that doesn’t require downloads or registrations.
games.howToPlayText: In the game, you need to open paths for liquids that match the color of the truck, and you should also avoid getting black liquid into colored liquid, otherwise it will evaporate. The game has 30 interesting levels, try to complete them all!

games.title: Pool Shoot Tournament
games.description: Explore the exciting realm of the Pool Shoot Tournament, an engaging online game that combines skill and strategy. This free arcade game tests your accuracy as you eliminate colored balls by matching three or more. Stay quick and precise to rise in the ranks, playable on both mobile and desktop!
games.howToPlayText: The objective of  is to earn the highest possible score by shooting the bubbles. Ball Shooting Mechanics: In order to earn maximum points, you need to shoot down a large group of balls in one shot, taking into account the rules of ricochet and direct hit. The minimum number of balls to group is three balls of the same color. Loss occurs as soon as at least one ball from the impending wall touches the bottom.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/pool-shoot-tournament-ac06-1?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Liquid Sort Puzzle
games.description:
Liquid Puzzle is a color game to fill each glass with one colored water to complete each level. Start sorting colored water!
Rearrange the contents of the glasses so that each ends up filled with only one color. Sorting must follow logical constraints you typically can only pour into a glass if the colors match at the top and there’s enough room
games.howToPlayText:
Tap or click a glass, then another to pour.
You can only pour if:
The color on top matches between glasses.
The receiving glass has enough capacity.
Your aim is to finish each level with minimal moves though Liquid Sort Puzzle

games.title: Paint Sponges Puzzle
games.description: Tap into your creativity with Paint Sponges Puzzle, a captivating online game that requires strategic skills and maze-solving ability. Navigate your colorful sponge across the grid, leaving a vibrant trail. Challenges increase as you advance, providing a fun blend of logic and artistry on both mobile and computer platforms.
games.howToPlayText:
The sponge moves with a swipe.
To complete the level, you need to paint over all the squares in the maze.
Have a nice game!

games.title: Sort Master
games.description:
Drag, tap, or move items to organize or sort them.
Each one is a distinct mini-game.
Arrange items by size, color, or another specified order.
Match items in pairs or groups.
Complete a visual task like building an image or aligning pieces.
Once everything is sorted or arranged correctly, the level ends and you can move on.
games.howToPlayText:
Each level is a unique mini-game that will not give you boredom. 
You'll have to find patterns and logical connections to pass on. 
A lot of different activities to enjoy: unpacking, fill the fridge, goods matching, color matching, sorting, and organizing all the things in their places and puzzles.

games.title: Color Dots Challenge
games.description:
Color Dots is a simple yet addictive puzzle game where you'll
Place each dot into its matching slot aim for precision
Enjoy an experience that’s both easy to learn and fun to play, making it ideal for quick breaks or longer sessions.
games.howToPlayText:
- Tap on color dot to move right place.
-Put the dots in their respective slots.
-Avoid Hitting other dots.
-Simple and fun puzzle game.
- Enjoy an experience that’s both easy to learn and fun to play.
- Play with fun.

games.title: Coin Color Sort
games.description:
Get ready to relax and enjoy with this unique color-matching puzzle game! 
Perfect for chilling out, Color Coin Puzzle offers you a soothing way to pass your time. With lots of levels, this game is all about relaxing your mind.

If you liked playing classic sorting games like Coin Sort or Ball Sort, you'll love Color Coin Puzzle! It's not just fun but also a good brain exercise.  Dive into the colorful world and sort colorful coins to get a satisfying experience.
games.howToPlayText:
- Tap and drag to move coins. You can only move coins of the same color. 
- Only one color coin can be moved at one time.
- You can place a coin on top of another only if both are of the same color.
- Try to stack all coins of the same color together. 
- Use your color matching skills to solve these fun logic puzzles.
- Enjoy thousands of levels for endless fun!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/coin-color-sort?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Stack Up
games.description:
Stack Em Up! is a casual single-player puzzle game where your goal is to connect stacks of the same color to combine them. By chaining same-colored stacks, you build longer stacks; you try to reach stacks of length 10 or more.
It’s stylised and simple in controls.
There are many levels that get progressively more challenging.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap on a stack: You select a stack by tapping it.
Connect with other stacks of the same color: Once you select a stack, you try to link it to other stacks of the same color to form a longer chain.
Form stacks / chains of 10 or more: One of the objectives is to make long stacks (length ≥ 10). Bigger stacks give more “score” / help you meet level-goals.
Watch your moves: You have limited moves or constraints per level; you must achieve the objective before you run out of moves, or before you run out of opportunity. 
Progress through levels: Levels get harder as you go, likely adding complications (more colors, tricky board layouts, etc.).
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/stack-up?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Color Roll 3D
games.description:
Experience one of the most addictive, color-filled puzzle game — Color Roll 3D! Think you've got a keen eye for details? Ready to challenge your brain? Then this color game is just for you! It's all about color, creativity, and some serious agility!

In Color Roll 3D, you'll need to copy the exact image you're shown, down to the last detail! How? Just by unrolling and arranging the vibrantly colored rolls the puzzle game give you for each level. Sounds easy, right? But wait, there's a catch! You've got to ensure the colors overlap in just the right way to perfectly match the image.

Got the image in your head? Great! Now get to work and let those colorful rolls fly! Just tap each roll and watch as it smoothly moves across your screen, bringing the image to life. But remember, it's all about getting those colors to line up just right!
games.howToPlayText:
You are given several colored rolls. Each roll is like a ribbon or band that you can tap to start unrolling.
When you tap, the roll moves/unrolls and overlays onto the puzzle area. The goal is that the overlapping colours and their positions match the sample image you’re trying to replicate.
The challenge comes from getting the direction and position of each roll correct. If you unroll a roll the wrong way, or overlay in the wrong spot, the final image will look different from the target.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/color-roll-3d?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Screw Match
games.description: Screw Match - Nuts and Bolts. Your task is to put screws of different colors on the glass nut to the box on the top with the same color as the screws. If the nut holes on the box are full, you will be replaced by a new box.
games.howToPlayText: Put screws of different colors on the glass nut to the box on the top with the same color as the screws
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/screw-match?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>
